content: wrap yourself or your loved ones in elegance and charm with this stunning crochet rose bouquet blanket this timeless blanket design brings together the warmth of handmade crochet with the beauty of a rose garden in full bloom ideal as a gift home decor piece or heirloom project this blanket is sure to be a showstopper each rose in this blanket is individually crocheted with soft double knit medium weight and texture of blossoming roses the bouquet arrangement spreads delicately across a neutral or complementary background giving the piece a graceful and balanced aesthetic surrounding the roses are life like green leaves and vine accents giving the bouquet a fuller more natural look
